definition: civil police/PRC police/abbr. for 人民警察

sentences.chinese: 人民警察必須做到公正執法。

sentences.english: In the first part , it dissects formational reasons of people"s polices violating the law and discipline in public security organs ."
sentences.chinese: 第一部分，剖析公安民警違法違紀行爲的成因。

sentences.english: When the police was doing investigation, his stepmother claimed she beat him for love.
sentences.chinese: 當民警調查時，其繼母竟稱愛他纔打他。

sentences.english: Good police physical ability is one of the necessary conditions for the policemen in public security work.
sentences.chinese: 良好的警察體能是公安民警從事公安工作的必備條件。

sentences.english: Jiang Xiaojuan is a Jiangyou Police station's ordinary police.
sentences.chinese: 蔣曉娟是江油市公安局的一名普通民警。

sentences.english: Police investigation, a man surnamed Lin admitted that he did beat Sumou.
sentences.chinese: 民警調查時，一名林姓男子承認，他確實毆打了蘇某。

sentences.english: Wu suspects gave police the statement of the cold body.
sentences.chinese: 嫌疑人吳某的供述還讓民警出了身冷汗。

sentences.english: Before policeman quality standard of whole some year whacker rises.
sentences.chinese: 整體的民警素質水平前些年有好大的提高。

sentences.english: People's policemen shall take an active part in rescue and relief work as well as in social welfare services.
sentences.chinese: 人民警察應當積極參加搶險救災和社會公益工作。

sentences.english: Followed by plainclothes police and reporters will be pulled into the roller shutter door entertainment city.
sentences.chinese: 隨後便衣民警和記者將捲簾門拉起進入了遊樂城。

sentences.english: The the police immediately suspect and the victim to by survey.
sentences.chinese: 該所民警立即將嫌疑人和受害人帶至所內調查。

sentences.english: Whoever poses as a People’s policeman in order to practise fraud shall be given a heavier punishment according to the provisions of the preceding paragraph.
sentences.chinese: 冒充人民警察招搖撞騙的，依照前款的規定從重處罰。

sentences.english: Qinghe police stations in the area, the police quickly found Liu.
sentences.chinese: 在清河派出所轄區，民警很快就找到了劉文。

sentences.english: The policemen found the woman walked to a quiet place where there was a new tomb.
sentences.chinese: 民警發現，婦女走到一個僻靜處，那裏有一座新墓。

sentences.english: The lost child was led back by a people's policeman.
sentences.chinese: 走失的孩子由一個人民警察領回來了。

sentences.english: Yue Square police station after police Jiejing, immediately rushed to the scene promptly control the situation.
sentences.chinese: 嶽坊派出所民警接警後，立即趕到現場及時控制事態。

definition: (of police, fire brigade etc) to receive a report of an incident
to dispatch police to the scene of crime, accident etc
traffic police/abbr. for 交通警察
to cause an accident/to be responsible for an incident/to provoke a disturbance
to deploy surveillance/to put under surveillance
to sound an alarm/to report sth to the police
